data.text: Ia oragh! Ia kamaghɨn nɨghnɨghan markɨ,
Ian arazir kurabaram amima,
Egha ian dafariba gumaziba mɨsozi me ariaghɨrima,
Ia deravɨra kotiabagh amir pu. Puvatɨ.
Ian nɨghnɨzir kuraba, mati kuruzir divimɨn aroriaba.
Ia zuraram arazir kuram damuasa bar ifonge.
Ia navir amɨrizimɨn tuavim gɨfozir puvatɨgha igharaz darazi ko deragha apiaghiri puvatɨ.
Ezɨ gumazamiziba kamaghɨn mɨgei:
Osɨmtɨzir kaba e gamima, e mati gumazir damazir okavɨrɨzibar mɨn tuavim buriagh arui.
Osɨmtɨzir kaba e gamima, e bar osemegha arai, mati afiar atiaba aroi.
“O Ikiavɨra Itir God, en arazir kuraba nɨn damazimɨn bar avɨraseme.
Ikiavɨra Itir God, en God, e arazir kuramɨn nɨ gamigha, akɨrim ragha nɨ gasaragha nɨ barazir puvatɨ.
E arazir kabagh amima, en arazir kam guizɨn nɨn arazim ko arazir aghuim gamima,
Guizɨn arazitam en itir puvatɨ.
Ikiavɨra Itir God garima, gumazamiziba guizɨn arazim gamir puvatɨ,
A garima, gumazamiziba paza gumazir igharazibagh amima, men akuraghamin gumazitam itir puvatɨ.
An arazir aghuir a zuraram amiba, evarimɨn pɨzir korotiamɨn mɨn aneru.
Egh Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn anɨngagharimɨn, a uan apanibar arazir kuraba ikarvagh,
Ikiavɨra Itir God puv ingara,
Ikiavɨra Itir God kamaghɨn mɨgei,
Egha Ikiavɨra Itir God kamaghɨn mɨgei,
